name: Game of Gates (VR)
description:
Game of Gates is educational video game using VR technology. To pass each level player has to solve logic circuit based on logic gates. 

Controls
Trigger - interaction with logic gates
Trackpad - teleporting
Playable only using VR headset

Game of Gates was created in order to write my BSc thesis: "Logic game using Virtual Reality and Unity engine". Developed using HTC Vive headset thanks to Rzeszow University of Technology.
